alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 11:10AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dickenson and Buchanan Counties through NOON EDT... At 1109 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jenkins, or 7 miles west of Clintwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clintwood, Grundy, Haysi, Breaks Interstate, Davenport, John Flannagan Lake, Big Rock, Trammel, Clinchco, Oakwood, Nora, Vansant, McClure and Roseann. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
